title: How will Google's bastardry of threatening to pull from Australia impact Australian pixel users?
content: This is just a general question and I'm not sure who to ask about this. I've enjoyed using my pixel the last couple years and would probably upgrade to a new pixel soon. But if Google pulling from Australia impacts their mobile devices then I'll most likely look elsewhere (frankly, their threat to throw Australian users under the bus is reason enough for me to give them the flick...)
